name: Dasherino
description:
A cartoonish, golf-like game where you can only move in dashes. Cue puzzle-driven level designs and mayhem!

The game takes place at the yearly dashing contest of Eshon. The main character Durbulb is the former champion and contests on the new course. His goal is to get his own personal best on the different challenges.

Creator, Lead Designer, Level Designer, Artist: David R Mincer
Game Designer, Physics Programmer: Tobias Neidhardt
Game Designer, Gameplay Programmer: Markus Kruge
